video.title: House GOP struggle to find votes for border wall funding
video.description: House Republicans look for a way to approve Trumps demand for $5 billion to fund the border wall; former ICE director Tom Homan and Human Rights Watch senior researcher Clara Long weigh in.

video.title: Exclusive Interview: Melania Trump sits down with Hannity
video.description: Hannity sits down for an exclusive one-on-one with First Lady Melania Trump aboard the USS George H.W. Bush. Mrs. Trump opens up about her roots and meeting her husband, as well as what she hopes to do for military personnel and their families.

video.title: Melania Trump tours military bases, Navy aircraft carrier
video.description: A behind-the-scenes look at the first lady's visit to service members. #Hannity #FoxNews

video.title: Hannity: Cohen sentenced to 3 years in prison
video.description: Michael Cohen pleads guilty to tax evasion, lying to Congress, and making false statements on a banking application. #Hannity #FoxNews

video.title: Tucker: Trump insists GOP Congress should fund wall
video.description: Trump is demanding the border wall gets built, Democrats and media slam the wall as 'racist.' #Tucker #FoxNews

video.title: Gowdy prepares to say goodbye to Washington DC
video.description: Looking back at Rep. Trey Gowdy's infamous exchanges as he prepares to say goodbye to Washington DC. Watch part 1 of the interview here: https://youtu.be/Yt0xprEaJfU

video.title: Gowdy blasts Comey: An 'amnesiac with incredible hubris'
video.description: Rep. Trey Gowdy weighs in on the impact new Mueller filings will have on the future of the Russia investigation, and reveals what it was like meeting President Trump for the first time earlier in the week.

video.title: Bernie Sanders on push for anti-Saudi Arabia legislation
video.description: Sen. Bernie Sanders on the push for bipartisan measures over Saudi-led war in Yemen. #SpecialReport #FoxNews

video.title: 'The Five' react to Michael Cohen's prison sentence
video.description: Trump's former 'fixer' Michael Cohen has been sentenced to three years in prison for an array of charges brought as a result of his part in hush money payments made to two women during the 2016 election. Reaction and analysis on 'The Five.' #TheFive #FoxNews

video.title: White House: Meadows not in running for Chief of Staff
video.description: White House responds to the rumors Rep. Mark Meadows is being eyed for chief of staff. #YourWorld #FoxNews

video.title: Theresa May survives no-confidence vote
video.description: British Prime Minister Theresa May gives remarks after winning 200 confidence votes in UK Parliament, enabling her to remain in power. May survived the vote despite wide-spread criticism of her handling of Brexit.

video.title: Rudy Giuliani reacts to Michael Cohen's sentencing
video.description: President Trump's personal attorney Rudy Giuliani plays down any implication that Trump committed a campaign finance violation; chief White House correspondent John Roberts reports.

video.title: Trump participates in an Executive Order signing event
video.description: President Trump participates in a signing event for an Executive Order establishing the White House Opportunity and Revitalization Council. This takes places just hours after his former personal attorney was sentenced to 3 years in prison.

video.title: Do Democrats have an agenda beyond investigating Trump?
video.description: The incoming Democratic majority in the House is not putting forward policy issues, says Republican Rep. Andy Biggs. #OutnumberedOvertime #FoxNews

video.title: Michael Cohen departs courthouse after sentencing
video.description: Michael Cohen, the former personal attorney to President Trump appeared before a federal judge this morning. Cohen was sentenced to 36 months in prison after pleading guilty to tax fraud, campaign finance violations, lying to Congress. Cohen will voluntarily surrender on March 6th. Get the latest updates here: https://fxn.ws/2zWzPmK

video.title: Michael Avenatti speaks after Cohen's sentencing
video.description: Stormy Daniels' attorney said, "Michael Cohen was sentenced today. Donald Trump is next."

video.title: Michael Cohen sentenced to 36 months in prison
video.description: President Trump's former personal attorney is sentenced on tax fraud, lying charges; Laura Ingle reports from the courthouse in New York.

video.title: Shapiro on Ocasio-Cortez claiming to have Jewish heritage
video.description: Democratic Congresswoman-elect Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez surprises a crowd at a Hanukkah event by saying she has Jewish heritage; reaction from Ben Shapiro, editor-in-chief of The Daily Wire.

video.title: Study finds US diplomats were attacked using sonic device
video.description: Dr. Marc Siegel reacts to new study finding U.S. diplomats in Cuba were attacked using a sonic device. #FoxNews

video.title: Cohen to be sentenced for federal crimes, lying to Congress
video.description: President Trump's former personal attorney could face 'substantial' prison time; Kevin Corke reports from the White House on how the president may react. What the live stakeout here: https://youtu.be/NY_Uy_EopLQ

video.title: Jordan on border wall: If we stand firm we can get it done
video.description: Ohio Republican Representative Jim Jordan weighs in on border wall funding and catch and release immigration reform.

video.title: Rep. Issa says there is outcome bias at Google
video.description: California Republican House Judiciary Committee member Rep. Darrell Issa weighs in on privacy concerns and bias after Google CEO Sundar Pichai testifies.

video.title: Tomi Lahren praises Trump for standing up to Pelosi, Schumer
video.description: Fox Nation host reacts to the border wall fight and previews her new special 'The Migrant Stand-Off.'

video.title: 'Fox & Friends' interviews Mike Pompeo
video.description: Secretary of State Mike Pompeo weighs in on the French terror attack, border security, Jamal Khashoggi murder, China, his speech in Brussels and Russia nuclear jets in Venezuela on 'Fox & Friends.'

video.title: Trump threatens to shut down gov't over border security
video.description: After publicly clashing with Democratic leaders, Trump declares he'd be proud to shut down the government for the wall; Sen. Mike Lee reacts.

video.title: Trump's annual financial disclosure released to public
video.description: The documents show a 2017 payment to attorney Michael Cohen for between $100K-$250K; chief White House correspondent John Roberts reports.

video.title: New worship center to be built in Sutherland Springs
video.description: Parishioners will head to new building after shooting

video.title: Senate Intel Committee says Russia favored Trump in 2016
video.description: Committee leaders break with House Republicans' conclusion in the ongoing Russia Investigation; Peter Doocy reports from Capitol Hill.

video.title: Prince Harry’s strained relationship with tabloids
video.description: Days before the royal wedding, Prince Harry and Meghan Markle’s private affairs are once again fodder for tabloids across the world. Harry has had a tumultuous relationship with the press since his childhood.

video.title: Man dies after vape pen explodes
video.description: A Florida was killed when his vape pen exploded, sending projectiles into his head and causing a small fire in his house. His official cause of death was listed as "projectile wound of the head" and ruled accidental.

video.title: New drama just days before royal wedding
video.description: Meghan Markle's family becomes tabloid fodder; Jonathan Hunt reports from Los Angeles.

video.title: Celebs weigh in on Yanny vs. Laurel debate
video.description: Take a listen to the audio clip that’s dividing the internet and find out what celebrities are saying. Do you hear ‘Laurel’ or ‘Yanny’?

video.title: Fears grow of Kilauea eruption as plumes reach 12,000 feet
video.description: Hawaii issues aviation red alert as volcano spews plume of ash; Jeff Paul reports from that National Guard Base in Hilo, Hawaii.

video.title: Don Jr. 'never discussed' Trump Tower meeting with Trump
video.description: Releases from Senator Chuck Grassley includes the closed-door testimony of Donald Trump Jr. and others who met with Russian lawyer; Ellison Barber reports from Washington.

video.title: Trump Tower meeting documents released
video.description: Documents: Donald Trump Jr. was skeptical about the Trump Tower meeting. Washington Examiner's Tom Rogan on what to look for in the documents.

video.title: Sanders: Trump is ready if North Korea meeting takes place
video.description: On 'Fox & Friends,' White House press secretary on North Korea threatening to cancel the U.S. summit and the Haspel confirmation process. Also, Sanders slams leaking as 'disgusting and shameful behavior.'

video.title: Anti-NRA, anti-GOP signs at school covered, but still up
video.description: Philadelphia school's signs that take aim at the GOP and NRA are sparking outrage. Outraged parent says the kids are being used as pawns.

video.title: Jimmy Kimmel uses nun to joke about Met Gala
video.description: Wall Street Journal columnist, William McGurn, says Sister Pat's life is about self-sacrifice.

video.title: Dershowitz: Media incentivize Hamas with biased reporting
video.description: Israel defends itself from Hamas invasion. Harvard Law professor opens up about his meeting with Israeli Prime Minister Netanyahu.

video.title: Trump-bashing causing the blue wave to crash?
video.description: Should Democrats change their midterm strategy? Strategists Ned Ryun and Richard Goodstein debate on 'Fox & Friends First.'

video.title: North Korea threatens to cancel summit with President Trump
video.description: U.S., South Korea military drills could end summit. Heritage Foundation senior fellow James Carafano weighs in on 'Fox & Friends First.'

video.title: Hume: Democrats' message 'indistinct'
video.description: Fox News senior political analyst Brit Hume: Democratic party is obsessed with Trump and the anti-Trump message, but it's not working out well for them in the polls. #Tucker

video.title: Minnesota daycare fraud scheme has possible link to terror
video.description: What appears to be rampant fraud in a state program is costing taxpayers as much as $100 million a year and could be going overseas to fund terrorism; State Sen. Jim Abeler reacts on 'Fox News@ Night.'

video.title: GOP chairmen want info on Comey friend Daniel Richman
video.description: Republican Congressman Andy Biggs, who sits on the House Judiciary Committee, joins 'Fox News @ Night' to discuss the DOJ's response.

video.title: Rep. Barletta to face Democratic Sen. Casey in Pennsylvania
video.description: The four-term congressman and staunch supporter of President Trump wins the Republican nomination for U.S. Senate; Eric Shawn reports.

video.title: Secretary Nielsen talks immigration, relationship with Trump
video.description: Homeland Security Secretary Kirstjen Nielsen joins 'The Ingraham Angle' to discuss her relationship with President Trump and the administration's plan to end catch-and-release on the border.

video.title: Ingraham: DACA detour jeopardizes GOP's new midterm momentum
video.description: Leave it to a liberal band of Republicans to splinter the party, just when unity is needed most.

video.title: Goodlatte responds to Republican revolt on immigration
video.description: Centrist Republicans aim to force DACA debate in the House with discharge petition; GOP Congressman Bob Goodlatte weighs in on 'The Ingraham Angle.'

video.title: What Trump can learn from Reagan's negotiations with USSR
video.description: Bret Baier, anchor of 'Special Report' and author of 'Three Days in Moscow,' joins 'Hannity' to discuss similarities between President Trump and Reagan's foreign policy strategies.

video.title: Media take shots at Trump, Ivanka over Mideast violence
video.description: New York Daily News equates Ivanka Trump to a demon; reaction on 'Hannity' from Dan Bongino, NRATV contributor and former Secret Service agent, and The Hill's Joe Concha.
